title: Bug Bounty Program Assessment
description: Rules of Engagement for participating in a public bug bounty program. All testing must comply with the program policy and legal safe harbor provisions. Focus on finding and responsibly disclosing security vulnerabilities.
constraints: Do not access other users data beyond proof of concept
Do not perform denial of service testing
Do not use social engineering or phishing
Do not test on production systems during peak hours
Do not chain exploits without program approval
Report findings through official program channels only
Do not publicly disclose findings until authorized
Automated scanning must be rate-limited (max 10 req/sec)
Do not access or modify customer data
Stop testing immediately if you access sensitive data accidentally
